L

LakeTiles - Class in edu.concordia.app.components
This class is to create the lake tile object, the lake tile have four colors and some of the lake tiles have a platform marker,again lake tile can have adjacent top/bottom/left/right lake tile
LakeTiles() - Constructor for class edu.concordia.app.components.LakeTiles
 
LakeTiles(int, String, String, String, String, boolean, int, int, int, int) - Constructor for class edu.concordia.app.components.LakeTiles
This constructor will set the fields of LakeTiles class.
LanternCards - Class in edu.concordia.app.components
This class is used to create the Lantern Cards The Lantern Cards are made up of 7 different colors There are 8 cards for each color Lantern Cards can be exchanged with favor tokens Lantern Cards can be exchanged with dedication tokens to score
LanternCards() - Constructor for class edu.concordia.app.components.LanternCards
Default constructor
LanternCards(LanternCards.Color) - Constructor for class edu.concordia.app.components.LanternCards
Constructor specifying the color of the Lantern Card.
LanternCards(LanternCards.Color, int) - Constructor for class edu.concordia.app.components.LanternCards
Constructor specifying the color of the Lantern Card.
LanternCards.Color - Enum in edu.concordia.app.components
An enum type is used for restricting the number of colors
LanternGameView - Class in edu.concordia.app.view

LanternMain - Class in edu.concordia.app.main
This is the main GUI class.

loadGameFromFile(String) - Method in class edu.concordia.app.controller.GameController
